org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.layouting.util

Class Vector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.layouting.util.Vector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Vector
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Simple helper-class for some vector-math. All math-operations will return a new Vector (instead of modifying the existing vector). This prevents strange side-effects when performing complex computations.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • distance

        public double distance(Vector other)
        Calculate the euclidean distance between this vector and another vector
        Parameters:
        other - The other vector
        Returns:
        Math.sqrt(Math.pow ( x - other.x, 2) + Math.pow(y - other.y, 2))

      • scalar

        public double scalar(Vector other)
        Calculate the scalar-product of this vector
        Parameters:
        other - The other vector
        Returns:
        Skalar-product of this and other

      • clamped

        public Vector clamped(double maxLen)
        Clamp this vector to a given length. The returned vector will have the same orientation as this one, but will have at most a length of maxLen. If maxLen is smaller the the lenght of this Vector this vector (a copy of it) will be returned.
        Parameters:
        maxLen - maximum lenght of vector
        Returns:
        This vector but constrained to the given length

      • normalized

        public Vector normalized()
        Normalize this vector.
        Returns:
        a vector with the same orientation as this one and a length of 1. If this vector is (0,0) then (0,0) will be returned instead.

      • magnitude

        public double magnitude()
        Get the lenght of this vector
        Returns:
        euclidean length of this vector

        Confine this point to the given bounding-box.
        Parameters:
        minX - Bounding-box
        maxX - Bounding-box
        minY - Bounding-box
        maxY - Bounding-box
        Returns:
        A vector that does not violate the given bounding box.

      • mClamped

        public Vector mClamped(double maxLen)
        Alternative MUTATING variant. Modifies this vector instead of creating a new one. BE CAREFUL! Clamp this vector to a given length. The returned vector will have the same orientation as this one, but will have at most a length of maxLen. If maxLen is smaller the the lenght of this Vector this vector (a copy of it) will be returned.
        Parameters:
        maxLen - maximum lenght of vector
        Returns:
        This vector but constrained to the given length

      • mNormalized

        public Vector mNormalized()
        Alternative MUTATING variant. Modifies this vector instead of creating a new one. BE CAREFUL! Normalize this vector.
        Returns:
        a vector with the same orientation as this one and a length of 1. If this vector is (0,0) then (0,0) will be returned instead.

      • mConfined

        public Vector mConfined(double minX,
                        double maxX,
                        double minY,
                        double maxY)
        Alternative MUTATING variant. Modifies this vector instead of creating a new one. BE CAREFUL! Confine this point to the given bounding-box.
        Parameters:
        minX - Bounding-box
        maxX - Bounding-box
        minY - Bounding-box
        maxY - Bounding-box
        Returns:
        A vector that does not violate the given bounding box.
